introduction.title: introduction
introduction.content: Enjoy the latest generation of games offered by IDNLIVE. The 12D game is a game that you are familiar with, this very simple and fun game comes with a new unique twist just for you. Enjoy Thunder Bonus up to 500x your stake and be a winner.

rules.title: rules
steps: This game uses one ball and a 12D board.
The game starts when the dealer opens the time to bet.
Now you have to place your bet on the betting panel that we provide.
All bets in the betting panel will be accepted automatically when the time is up.
After the betting period ends, the Dealer will roll the ball across the board to determine the outcome for that period.
All bets of 50-50 type will be refunded if the game result is Jackpot.
All Number and Column and Row bets will lose if the game result is Jackpot.
The Thunder Bonus only applies to single number bets.

The result consists only of the numbers 1 to 12 and the Jackpot, if the ball is not clearly positioned then a "no game" status will occur and the dealer will roll the ball one more time until the result is clear.

split.title: Split
split.description: Bet on two adjacent numbers vertically/horizontally
split.winning-conditions: The result is 1 of the 2 adjacent numbers you bet on

corner.title: Corner
corner.description: Bet on four numbers meeting in one corner
corner.winning-conditions: The result is 1 of the 4 adjacent numbers you bet on

line.title: Column
line.description: Bet on a column of numbers
line.winning-conditions: The result is a number that is in the Line you bet on

row.title: Row
row.description: Bet on a row of numbers
row.winning-conditions: The result is a number that is in the Row you bet on

odd.title: Odd
odd.winning-conditions: The result is an Odd Number

even.title: Even
even.winning-conditions: The result is an Even Number

thunder-bonus.title: Thunder Bonus
thunder-bonus.mechanism-content: In this game, we provide a unique and attractive bonus system so that you will be able to get very big wins. The following will explain the Thunder Bonus mechanism:
mechanism-points: In each round of the game, after placing your bet and the betting time is up, a number of lightning will appear above the 12D Thunder virtual board.
In 1 game round, a minimum of 1 lightning and a maximum of 5 lightning will appear.
The appearance of this lightning shows the location and bonus multiplication of the thunder bonus on each of these numbers.
The number, location of the lightning, and the bonus multiplication will appear randomly.
This Thunder Bonus only applies to single number bets. All bets outside this single number will not get this thunder bonus.
how-to-get-points: You have to bet on a single number bet.
If the number you bet comes out as the result of the game and there is a bonus multiplication above the result, you will get a bonus as big as the multiplication.

example-1.title: Example of Getting the Thunder Bonus
example-1.content: Here is an example of a game that will get the Thunder Bonus:
points: Bet on the number {{numbers}} for {{bet, number}}.
There are {{totalThunder}} multiplications on the virtual board.
The ball stops at number {{result}}, which is multiplied by {{valueThunder}}x.
You will get a bonus of {{valueThunder}} times the value of your bet.
Your total winnings will be {{win, number}}.
